0110111101110001 1001000010110111 0 -> sum: 0000000000101000, cout: 1

0100010001011101 0011110010100000 0 -> sum: 1000000011111101, cout: 0
0101101011110011 0001111010001001 1 -> sum: 0111100101111101, cout: 0
0001101110000100 0111010100001000 0 -> sum: 1001000010001100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
